stimulusHtml: Consider the call  puzzle(3),  which appears in a method in the same class as  puzzle.  What value, if any, is returned as a result of the call  puzzle(3)?

features.html:
Consider the following method.

 

public static double puzzle(int x) 
{
   Double y = x / 2.0;
   y /= 2;   
   return y; 
}

choicesHtml: Nothing is returned because a  Double  value cannot be returned from a method with return type  double.
